CustomProfile.Description: Aliens: Extermination is a 2006 first‑person light‑gun game by Play Mechanix and Global VR that returns the Colonial Marines to LV‑426 years after their initial mission. Players fight through the ruined colony to finish off the Alien population while contending with an army of reprogrammed synthetic humans dispatched by Weyland‑Yutani. It’s no longer just about killing the Queen — you must survive waves of Xenomorphs and deadly androids in this sci‑fi shooter.
